001// import javax.swing.*;
002// import java.awt.*;
003// import java.awt.event.*;
004// import java.net.URL;
005// import java.awt.image.*;
006import javax.swing.JFrame;
007import javax.swing.JTextField;
008import javax.swing.JTextArea;
009import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
010import javax.swing.JLayeredPane;
011import javax.swing.JLabel;
012import javax.swing.JPanel;
013import javax.swing.JButton;
014import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
015import javax.swing.Timer;
016import java.awt.GridLayout;
017import java.awt.GridBagLayout;
018import java.awt.GridBagConstraints;
019import java.awt.BorderLayout;
020import java.awt.Color;
021import java.awt.Dimension;
022import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
023import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
024import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
025import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
026import java.awt.Font;
027import java.net.URL;
028
029
030
031/**
032 * Class UserInterface - Implements a simple graphical user interface with a 
033 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
034 * 
035 * @author Michael Kolling
036 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023)
037 */
038public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
039{
040    private GameEngine aEngine;
041    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
042    private JTextField aEntryField;
043    private JTextArea  aLog;
044    private JLabel     aImage;
045    
046    private JButton    aInvButton;
047    private JButton    aHelpButton;
048    private JButton    aQuitButton;
049    private JButton    aNorthButton;
050    private JButton    aSouthButton;
051    private JButton    aWestButton;
052    private JButton    aEastButton;
053    private JButton    aNWButton;
054    private JButton    aSEButton;
055    private JButton    aBackButton;
056    private JButton    aUpButton;
057    private JButton    aDownButton;
058    
059    public JLabel     aTimerLabel;
060    private Timer     aGameTimer;
061    private int       timeRemaining = 480;
062
063    
064    /**
065     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
066     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
067     * needed.
068     * 
069     * @param pGameEngine The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
070     */
071    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
072    {
073        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
074        this.createGUI();
075    } // UserInterface(.)
076
077    /**
078     * Print out some text into the text area.
079     * 
080     * @param pText The text to print.
081     */
082    public void print( final String pText )
083    {
084        this.aLog.append( pText );
085        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
086    } // print(.)
087
088    /**
089     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
090     * 
091     * @param pText The text to print.
092     */
093    public void println( final String pText )
094    {
095        this.print( pText + "\n" );
096    } // println(.)
097
098    /**
099     * Show an image file in the interface.
100     * 
101     * @param pImageName The name of the image file to display.
102     */
103    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
104    {
105        String vImagePath = "images/" + pImageName; // to change the directory
106        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
107        if ( vImageURL == null )
108            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
109        else {
110            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
111            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
112            this.aMyFrame.pack();
113        }
114    } // showImage(.)
115
116    /**
117     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
118     * 
119     * @param pOnOff If true, enables input; if false, disables input.
120     */
121    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
122    {
123        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
124        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
125            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
126            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
127        }
128        else { // disable
129            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
130            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
131            this.aGameTimer.stop();
132        }
133    } // enable(.)
134
135    /**
136     * Set up graphical user interface.
137     */
138    private void createGUI()
139    {
140        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "Stranded" );
141        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
142
143        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
144        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
145        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
146        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(420, 200) );
147        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
148        
149        JLayeredPane vImagePlusTimer = new JLayeredPane();
150        vImagePlusTimer.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(800, 600));
151        
152        this.aImage = new JLabel();
153        this.aImage.setBounds(0, 0, 800, 600);
154        vImagePlusTimer.add(this.aImage,0);
155        
156        this.aTimerLabel = new JLabel("00:00", JLabel.CENTER); 
157        this.aTimerLabel.setFont(new Font("Arial", Font.BOLD, 20));  
158        this.aTimerLabel.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
159        this.aTimerLabel.setOpaque(true);
160        this.aTimerLabel.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
161        this.aTimerLabel.setBounds(350, 570, 100, 30);
162        this.aTimerLabel.setVisible(false);
163        vImagePlusTimer.add(this.aTimerLabel,1);
164
165        this.aGameTimer = new Timer(1000, new ActionListener()
166        {
167            @Override
168            public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
169            {
170                timeRemaining--;
171                int vMinutes = timeRemaining / 60;
172                int vSeconds = timeRemaining % 60;
173                aTimerLabel.setText(String.format("%02d:%02d", vMinutes, vSeconds));
174                
175                if (timeRemaining <= 0)
176                {
177                    println("\nCritical alert !!! The ship has entered the atmosphere of the nearby planet.");
178                    println("Hull integrity failing... Brace for impact !");
179                    println("\nYou tried your best, but time has run out.\nThe ship succumbs to gravity, plummeting towards the surface.");
180                    println("Your journey ends here. Game Over.");
181                    enable( false );
182                }
183            }
184        });
185        this.aGameTimer.start();
186        
187        
188        JPanel vRightPanel = new JPanel();
189        GridLayout vGrid = new GridLayout(3, 3);
190        vRightPanel.setLayout(vGrid);
191        vGrid.setHgap(4);
192        vGrid.setVgap(4);
193        
194        this.aNWButton = new JButton("ðŸ¡¤");
195        this.aNWButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
196        this.aNWButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
197        this.aNWButton.addActionListener(this);
198        vRightPanel.add(this.aNWButton);
199        
200        this.aNorthButton = new JButton("ðŸ¡¡");
201        this.aNorthButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
202        this.aNorthButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
203        this.aNorthButton.addActionListener(this);
204        vRightPanel.add(this.aNorthButton);
205    
206        this.aUpButton = new JButton("Up");
207        this.aUpButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
208        this.aUpButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
209        this.aUpButton.addActionListener(this);
210        vRightPanel.add(this.aUpButton);
211    
212        this.aWestButton = new JButton("ðŸ¡ ");
213        this.aWestButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
214        this.aWestButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
215        this.aWestButton.addActionListener(this);
216        vRightPanel.add(this.aWestButton);
217        
218        this.aBackButton = new JButton("Back");
219        this.aBackButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
220        this.aBackButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
221        this.aBackButton.addActionListener(this);
222        vRightPanel.add(this.aBackButton);
223    
224        this.aEastButton = new JButton("ðŸ¡¢");
225        this.aEastButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
226        this.aEastButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
227        this.aEastButton.addActionListener(this);
228        vRightPanel.add(this.aEastButton);
229    
230        this.aDownButton = new JButton("Down");
231        this.aDownButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
232        this.aDownButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
233        this.aDownButton.addActionListener(this);
234        vRightPanel.add(this.aDownButton);
235    
236        this.aSouthButton = new JButton("ðŸ¡£");
237        this.aSouthButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
238        this.aSouthButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
239        this.aSouthButton.addActionListener(this);
240        vRightPanel.add(this.aSouthButton);
241    
242        this.aSEButton = new JButton("ðŸ¡¦");
243        this.aSEButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
244        this.aSEButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
245        this.aSEButton.addActionListener(this);
246        vRightPanel.add(this.aSEButton);
247        
248        
249        JPanel vLeftPanel = new JPanel();
250        vLeftPanel.setLayout(new GridBagLayout());
251        GridBagConstraints vGBC = new GridBagConstraints();
252        vGBC.gridx = 0;
253        vGBC.weightx = 1.0;
254        vGBC.weighty = 1.0;
255        vGBC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
256        
257        this.aInvButton = new JButton("Inventory");
258        this.aInvButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
259        this.aInvButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
260        this.aInvButton.addActionListener(this);
261        vLeftPanel.add(this.aInvButton,vGBC);
262        
263        this.aHelpButton = new JButton("Help");
264        this.aHelpButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
265        this.aHelpButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
266        this.aHelpButton.addActionListener(this);
267        vLeftPanel.add(this.aHelpButton,vGBC);
268        
269        this.aQuitButton = new JButton("Quit");
270        this.aQuitButton.setBackground(Color.BLACK);
271        this.aQuitButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);
272        this.aQuitButton.addActionListener(this);
273        vLeftPanel.add(this.aQuitButton,vGBC);
274        
275        
276        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
277        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
278        vPanel.add(vImagePlusTimer, BorderLayout.NORTH);
279        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
280        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
281        vPanel.add( vLeftPanel, BorderLayout.WEST);
282        vPanel.add( vRightPanel, BorderLayout.EAST);
283    
284        
285        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
286
287        // add some event listeners to some components
288        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
289
290        // to end program when window is closed
291        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
292            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
293                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
294                {
295                    System.exit(0);
296                }
297        } );
298
299        this.aMyFrame.pack();
300        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
301        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
302    } // createGUI()
303
304    /**
305     * Actionlistener interface for buttons and entry textfield.
306     * 
307     * @param pE The ActionEvent triggered by the user's interaction.
308     */
309    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
310    {
311        if (pE.getSource() == this.aInvButton) 
312        {
313            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("inventory");
314        }
315        if (pE.getSource() == this.aHelpButton) 
316        {
317            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("help");
318        }
319        if (pE.getSource() == this.aQuitButton) 
320        {
321            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("quit");
322        }
323        if (pE.getSource() == this.aNWButton) 
324        {
325            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go northwest");
326        }
327        if (pE.getSource() == this.aNorthButton) 
328        {
329            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go north");
330        }
331        if (pE.getSource() == this.aUpButton) 
332        {
333            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go upstairs");
334        }
335        if (pE.getSource() == this.aDownButton) 
336        {
337            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go downstairs");
338        }
339        if (pE.getSource() == this.aWestButton) 
340        {
341            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go west");
342        }
343        if (pE.getSource() == this.aEastButton) 
344        {
345            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go east");
346        }
347        if (pE.getSource() == this.aBackButton) 
348        {
349            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("back");
350        }
351        if (pE.getSource() == this.aSouthButton) 
352        {
353            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go south");
354        }
355        if (pE.getSource() == this.aSEButton) 
356        {
357            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go southeast");
358        }
359        else if (pE.getSource() == this.aEntryField)
360        {
361            this.processCommand();
362        }
363    } // actionPerformed(.)
364
365    /**
366     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
367     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
368     */
369    private void processCommand()
370    {
371        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
372        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
373
374        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
375    } // processCommand()
376} // UserInterface
